error.auth_failed: Unable to authenticate with the desk. This is usually solved by using an ESPHome Bluetooth Proxy. Please check the integration documentation for alternative workarounds.
error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect. Make sure that the desk is in Bluetooth pairing mode. If not already, you can also use an ESPHome Bluetooth Proxy, as it provides a better connection.

abort.no_devices_found: No unconfigured devices found. Make sure that the desk is in Bluetooth pairing mode. Enter pairing mode by pressing the small button with the Bluetooth logo on the controller for about 3 seconds, until it starts blinking.
